    virtualpets  

    • Uses of Player in virtualpets

      Methods in virtualpets that return Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Player[] GameEnvironment.rankPlayers()
      Ranks players based on score in descending order of score.
      Methods in virtualpets that return types with arguments of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Player> GameEnvironment.getPlayerList()
      Returns the list of players.
      Methods in virtualpets with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Player.compareTo(Player otherPlayer)
      Compares this player with another to determine which of them has the higher score.
      void GameEnvironment.initialisePlayer(Player currentPlayer)
      Initialises a player's turn.
      void HomePanel.refreshPlayerStats(Player currentPlayer, int numActions)
      Refreshes player balance, number of actions remaining, and the current player displayed to the user.
      void HomePanel.refreshTabs(Player currentPlayer, Pet currentPet, int currentDay, int numActions, java.lang.Boolean currentlySleeping, java.lang.Boolean currentlyOnToilet)
      Refreshes all statistics and tabs presented to user.
      void ScoreboardPanel.showRanking(Player[] playerList)
      Display the ranking of players.
      void StorePanel.updatePlayerInventory(Player currentPlayer)
      Update the players inventory.
